title: Can any one tell me what this lovely Serif Stencil is?
author: jordanfisher

comments.content:
Hey thank Seb.

Yeah is a similar ilk - Avia not quite as minimal.

Also found this one which is even nicer - maybe its a custom?

meandjordan.com

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141118174459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/peter_and_paul_bagdad_03_5626.jpg.jpeg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141118174459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/peter_and_paul_bagdad_03_5626.jpg.jpeg)

Funny, I came in today to see if anyone offered up any leads to my own inquiry about this font from Matches' site the other week. History was the best suggestion, but it's not quite the same.

[http://typophile.com/node/55699](http://web.archive.org/web/20141118174459/http:/typophile.com/node/55699 "http://typophile.com/node/55699")

Thanks loads for your help.

History is great.

meandjordan.com

Thanks loads for your help.

History is great.

meandjordan.com

Hi Jordan

History is great, but it's not as heavyweight as what you're showing here. This is based on an ultra-heavy Bodoni or Didot style. I would have said MT Engravers Bold, but the brackets are straight on that one. _(BTW, could you please stop double posting/repeating yourself... I find it very unsettling)_
